titleStmt.title: Pharmacopœia Londinensis, or, The London dispensatory further adorned by the studies and collections of the Fellows, now living of the said colledg ... / by Nich. Culpeper, Gent.
Pharmacopoeia Londinensis. English
titleStmt.author: Royal College of Physicians of London.
Culpeper, Nicholas, 1616-1654.

notesStmt.note: Originally published in 1649 under title: A physicall directory, or, A translation of the London dispensatory, made by the Colledge of Physicians in London.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
